Title: Freeing Mind and Body
Description:
Mogu stealing peoples minds! Making them do evil things.

Don't kill them, just kill the mogu, then they forget about all the mogu mind stealing and stop being evil. You should fix people like Rook is.
ObjectivesText: Free 6 Dominated Guards by killing their controllers.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Rook Stonetoe at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
